page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE -MOTHER
page.content: {Monday, July 2nd,1985 Woken at 7.00 hours by the{radio alarm.Listen to the news.39 American {hostages}have been released and are flying back to the{United States. The usual dash for the bathroom,then a hurried breakfast with my husband and two children aged 14 and 11.My husband,a manager in a{pharmaceutical company,leaves for{Bristol}with my daughter.He gives her a lift in the car when he can. My son and I leave half an hour later.I drop him at Bathwick Primary School and drive out of the city to a {private hospital}where I work part time as a{secretary}to two{surgeons. I leave hospital at 15.30 hours,pick up my son from school and my daughter from the{bus stop.}Return home and prepare evening meal.
